fields.headline: What's on when
fields.bodyText: St Briavels' Bread and Cheese Dole Date: May 19. Location: St Mary's Church, St Briavels, Gloucestershire. Description: In a tradition dating back to the 12th century, crowds jostle to catch the bread and cheese thrown from the church steps. Contact: 01594 530345. Website: What's On When Manu Chao Radio Bemba Sound System Date: May 25. Location: Prague Castle, Prague, Czech Republic. Description: Manu Chao's legendary live act in the awesome surroundings of Prague Castle. Contact: 00420 2 2481 8080. Website: What's On When Detroit Electronic Music Festival Date: May 25-27. Location: Hart Plaza, Detroit, Michigan, US. Description: Detroit lays claim to be the birthplace of modern electro and hosts this symposium of one of the 20th century's most innovative genres. Contact: 001 313 392 9200. Website: What's On When Devil Dancers of Venezuela Date: May 29-30. Location: Church Squares in towns across Venezuela. Description: Throughout Corpus Christi, "Diablos Danzantes" whirl through the pueblos sporting ferocious masks. Contact: 0058 2 576 56 96. Website: What's On When
